name: flame-charge
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Raises the user’s Speed by one stage.
short_effect: Inflicts regular damage. Raises the user’s Speed by one stage.

flavor_text.black_white: The user cloaks itself with flame and attacks. Building up more power, it raises the user’s Speed stat.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user cloaks itself with flame and attacks. Building up more power, it raises the user’s Speed stat.
